author: Alexandre Franke
message:
It was a pleasure to be your neighbor and to come play with your games. I had a great time, thanks to you!

Now I'll have to explain to my GNOME fellows why there's a photo of me on Planet KDE… ;-)

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message:
Thanks for the nice words, it was nice catching up on GNOME with you.

Regarding the photo: I picked one which was only showing your back so that it would not be too compromising, but I guess this plan failed :)
